education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science

education.institution: GH Raisoni Institute of Engineering and Technology
education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science

bullets: Designed and implemented RESTful APIs and microservices in Python and React, optimizing application response times by 30%.
Managed MySQL and Oracle databases for backend systems, writing complex SQL queries to enhance business intelligence analytics.
Built interactive PowerBI dashboards to visualize KPI monitoring reports, improving client decision-making efficiency.
Automated testing pipelines using Docker and Jenkins, ensuring code quality and stability for production releases.
Automated web server deployments (Apache/Nginx) using Ansible playbooks across AWS and GCP environments.
Developed Bash and Python scripts to monitor server health and GPU utilization, reducing diagnostic time by 40%.
Configured Hadoop and Hive clusters for distributed data processing tasks.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines via Jenkins to maintain consistent multi-cloud deployments.

projects.title: AutoResuAgent: Agentic NLP System
bullets: Developed an end-to-end agentic NLP pipeline to automate resume tailoring, improving skill-coverage accuracy by 15% using semantic retrieval.
Integrated asynchronous concurrency to process 10+ applications in parallel, achieving a 10x throughput gain.
Implemented Pydantic schema validation to reduce LLM hallucinations by 30%.
projects.description: A technical project focused on AutoResuAgent: Agentic NLP System using Python, LangChain, FAISS.

projects.title: AI-Based Code Autograder
bullets: Built an intelligent grading engine using GPT-4 and Python that evaluates student code assignments and provides JSON feedback.
Reduced manual grading time by 80% while maintaining 95% accuracy through automated analysis.
projects.description: A technical project focused on AI-Based Code Autograder using Python, GPT-4 API, SQL.

projects.title: RL Load Balancer
bullets: Developed a reinforcement learning-based system (DQN) to distribute network traffic dynamically across servers.
Leveraged GPU acceleration for training, achieving 40% latency reduction.
Deployed microservices on Kubernetes with real-time performance monitoring.
projects.description: A technical project focused on RL Load Balancer using Python, TensorFlow, AWS.
